text:
Abey, tu bhi hai idhaar?! Aur bhai, sab badhiya? Lol, tu pehle din se mast admi tha. Itna kind, polite admi kaam hi dekhne ko milte hai. Sach bolu toh meko tera zyada zaroorat raha jitna maine count kiya as compared to tujhe mera. Thanks for everything.

Aur bc last day mai photo reh hi gaya kyunki tu mauz mai tha :P kabhi ata hoon Indore photo khichane. Gyaan dete raho mast. Milte hai aur. Chal bye!
author: Debashish  Reang

text:
Lol kya hi likhu? I remember waving at you a few times but don't recall any in-person interaction. Other than your Facebook posts and comments, and your shitty website I really don't know much. Someone told me you're gonna get andha paisa at Uber, good for you. Bhai 100-200 leke mera 4.68 se 5.00 stars kara dena please.

At least kahin toh full aye. Oh, who Twitter name se lock hata do please, bandi milega.
author: Debashish  Reang

text:
"Aur Malya, sab mast?" Yehi bolte bolte pura degree nikal gaya. Orientation mai sabse pehle Audi mai mila tha, aur campus pe last din mai Quad pe mile. Tu mast admi hai yaar. Padhai mai toh chaapu ho hi. Huge respect man. Jis course mai mai fail hone wala hoon usme tu aramse full la deta hai. Baaki PHY wala pyaar banaye rakhna, Batti mai kuch nahin rakha hai :P

Haan line toh marna chahiye tha, lekin katwake kya karna, toh jane do xD.
author: Debashish  Reang

text: My first Chacha on campus. It's been a pleasure knowing you. May you be a nice aerospace engineer, lol.
author: Debashish  Reang

text:
Hi chacha.
Paisa wapas kar de bisi.
author: Debashish  Reang

text:
Lol, hi!
All the best getting rich and all. We've prolly had less in-person interactions overall, but whatever little interaction we had was nice. You're a great person, who seems to have an idea about what she's doing xD. Kabhi Varanasi aunga, toh ghuma dena tab.
See ya!
author: Debashish  Reang

text:
Chaapte raho fren. We probably did not know about each other's existence until the third year or so, but it's been nice knowing you. I guess that's all I gotta say now. Although, I really won't mind a "placements treat" sooner or later.
All the best for you future days. Although, batti wale ho to sahi hi jayega mostly I suppose lol. Ok, see ya!
author: Debashish  Reang

text:
Bauaa, tu mast admi hai re. Matlab itna dedication se sab kuch karte ho, dekhke mann mai halka sa izzat ane lagta hai. Suna hai desh badalna chahte ho, I hope tera sapna sach ho. Lage raho jo bhi kar rahe ho. Bada admi ban jao toh bhul mat jana hume. Kabhi ghar ate hai tumhare.

Alag chaapu ho yaar. Bas wing photo saath mai nahin ho paya uska dukh hai. :(
author: Debashish  Reang

text:
Oh, tune public kar diya finally. If I wanted, I could have DM'd you but jane do kya hi yaad rakhoge. Tere jaise ghatiya dost toh kisiko na hi mile. kyu hi dost hai hum?!

That said, tu kaafi mast admi hai. I'm not gonna lie, tu billy jaise dikhte lol. tera harkate bhi waisa hi hai. Thank God kabhi kata nahin. Baaki toh tareef karne se tu udne lagega so woh nahin karunga. Oh haan, shaadi mai bulana zaroor. And mai kabhi Assam aya toh bridge pe photoshoot ke liye ja sakte.

Thanks for being a great friend over the years. I wonder what would have become of me if it weren't for your constant and unwavering support. Countless hours of pointless cycling just because I wanted to, and midnight talks at OAT are something I'll remember for quite some time. The last I checked, you owe me a few chocolates so you better send them soon.
author: Debashish  Reang

text:
The first and only time that we met in person was probably during Cult meet in Dec, 2019. Bus mai kaafi sahi jokes mare the. Hindi bhi ghatiya hai mera toh but chalo samajh mai aa jaye toh zyada mat rona. Kabhi milte hai in-person. Idhar hi apna mahan desh mai hai abhi toh. Sahi jokes sochke ana tab. Aur haan tab tak failao gandagi Facebook par, kisika baap ka thodi hai.

Sabko waiver lene bolte raho xD.
author: Debashish  Reang
